recipesJson.name: Good Morning
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: I love to have this vape in the morning with my coffee. Perfect amount of Flavor just a great Vape. Steep 3-5 days for greatness.

reviews.text: This ought to be renamed Good Day! Because this is definitely an ADV just mixed this up last week and it's great right off the shake, but definitely gets better through the week... Too bad I could only give you 5 üåü because both my wife and I absolutely love it! Great recipe! It's definitely going into my constant rotation and my favorite recipes file! Great job! üëçüëç
